xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.8 Hetuduka, Dassanenapahātabbattika » 1.8.3 Nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbapada » 1.8.3.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Nahetvādi
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Dassanenapahātabbattika
Nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Nahetvādi
276.
557Nahetuṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
558Hetuṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
559Nahetuṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
560Hetuṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca nahetuṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
561Hetuṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
277.
562Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
563Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
564Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
565(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
